title: Population of Greece 2016 , by gender

gold: This statistic displays the population of Greece by gender in 2016.
In this year there were a total of 10.78 million inhabitants in Greece.
There were almost 5.56 million female inhabitants , whereas there were less than 5.3 million male inhabitants .
